Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: fiddle-faddle \fid"dle-fad`dle\, n. A trifle; trifling talk; nonsense. [Colloq.] --Spectator. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: fiddle-faddle \fid"dle-fad`dle\, v. i. To talk nonsense. [Colloq.] --Ford. [1913 Webster]
